paragraphs.text:
%md
## 1.10. Create a Table with OpenCSV SerDe

1. Create table `wdi_opencsv_gs`  ( load GS data with `OpenCSVSerde`)
       - Use `org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.OpenCSVSerde`
           - Use GS location `gs://usmanjrvs/datasets/wdi_2016
2. Create table `wdi_opencsv_text (output table with hdfs location)
   - `hdfs` location ( e.g `hdfs:///user/usman/hive/wdi/wdi_opencsv_text` )
   - comma delimited format
   - plain text files ( no compression, no special format )
3. Load data from `wdi_opencsv_gs` to `wdi_opencsv_text`
4. Verify parsing ( e.g. `SELECT DISTINCT(indicatornode`))
   1. Compare runtime `SELECT COUNT(countryName) FROM vdi_opencsv_text SELECT count(countryName) FROM wdi_csv_text`; Why `wdi_opencsv_text` is significantly slower?

msg.data:
1.10. Create a Table with OpenCSV SerDe

  1. Create table wdi_opencsv_gs ( load GS data with OpenCSVSerde)
    • Use org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.OpenCSVSerde
      • Use GS location `gs://usmanjrvs/datasets/wdi_2016
  2. Create table `wdi_opencsv_text (output table with hdfs location)
  • hdfs location ( e.g hdfs:///user/usman/hive/wdi/wdi_opencsv_text )
  • comma delimited format
  • plain text files ( no compression, no special format )
  1. Load data from wdi_opencsv_gs to wdi_opencsv_text
  2. Verify parsing ( e.g. SELECT DISTINCT(indicatornode))
  3. Compare runtime SELECT COUNT(countryName) FROM vdi_opencsv_text SELECT count(countryName) FROM wdi_csv_text; Why wdi_opencsv_text is significantly slower?

paragraphs.text:
%spark.sql
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE wdi_opencsv_gs
     (year INTEGER, countryName STRING, countryCode STRING, indicatorName STRING, indicatorCode STRING, indicatorValue FLOAT)
     ROW FORMAT SERDE 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.OpenCSVSerde'
     WITH SERDEPROPERTIES (
     "separatorChar" = ",",
     "quoteChar" = "\"",
     "escapeChar" = "\\"
     )
     LOCATION 'gs://usmanjrvs/datasets/wdi_2016'

paragraphs.text:
%md
## 1.12. Hive Partiotions

Optimize `2015 Canada GDP Growth` HQL using Partiotion

1. Create `wdi_opencsv_text_partitions` table which partitioned by `year`

2. Load data from `wdi_opencsv_text` to `wdi_opencsv_text_partitions` ( Hint: dynamic partitions ) https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Tutorial#Tutorial-Dynamic-PartitionInsert

   ```mysql
   DROP TABLE IF EXISTS wdi_opencsv_text_partitions;
   CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE wdi_opencsv_text_partitions (
   countryName STRING, countryCode STRING,
   indicatorName STRING, indicatorCode STRING, indicatorValue FLOAT
   ) PARTITIONED BY (year INTEGER)
   ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
   LOCATIN 'hdfs:///user/usman/hive/wdi/wdiopencsv_text_partitions';
   
   #set hive.exec.max.dynamic.partitons=512;
   #set hive.exec.max.dynamic.partitions.pernode=512;
   #set hive.optimize.sort.dynamic.partition=false;
   
   SELECT countryName,
          countrycode,
         indicatorname,
         indicatorcode,
         indicatorvalue,
         YEAR
   FROM wdi_opencsv_text;
   ```

```mysql
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS wdi_opencsv_text_partitions;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE wdi_opencsv_text_partitions (
countryName STRING, countryCode STRING,

ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
```

paragraphs.text:
%spark.sql

SELECT wdi_csv_parquet.indicatorValue AS value,
       wdi_csv_parquet.year AS year,
       wdi_csv_parquet.countryName AS country
FROM (SELECT MAX(indicatorValue) AS ind,
             countryName
            FROM wdi_csv_parquet
      WHERE indicatorCode = 'NY.GDP.MKTP.KD.ZG'
            and  indicatorValue <> 0
      GROUP BY countryName) AS t1
      INNER JOIN wdi_csv_parquet
            ON t1.ind = wdi_csv_parquet.indicatorValue
               AND t1.countryName = wdi_csv_parquet.countryName
